nodes.text: This Aqua droid participated in the Battle of Mon Cala around 21 BBY under command of Separatist commander Karkarodon Riff Tamson.

During the Battle of Mon Cala, the Galactic Republic forces as well as the Mon Calamari were defeated in the second assault on the Mon Calamari capital city, and most of the city's inhabitants were imprisoned, along with the Republic forces sent to protect them, including Jedi Knights Anakin Skywalker and Kit Fisto, senator Padmé Amidala and Gungan representative Jar Jar Binks.

Later on during the war, Mon Calamari prince Lee-Char was also captured by the Separatists and was sentenced to public execution by commander Riff Tamson. This droid along with others helped transport Padmé Amidala and Jar Jar Binks to witness the execution of the prince. It is presumed that this droid was destroyed along with the rest of the Separatist forces when the Galactic Republic and Mon Calamari won the battle.
